item.title: 新墨西哥州将投资 3.15 亿美元推动量子计算发展
item.description: 新墨西哥州是世界上第一颗原子弹的试验地，本周二，该州计划投资 3.15 亿美元，力争成为另一项可能决定时代的技术--量子计算--的领导者。【原文：New Mexico, site of the world's first atomic bomb tests, on Tuesday plans to invest $315 million in a bid to become a leader in another potentially era-defining technology: quantum computing.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，派拉蒙与动视合作拍摄《使命召唤》真人电影
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 公司已与微软旗下的动视暴雪公司达成协议，将视频游戏系列《使命召唤》改编成真人电影。【原文：Paramount Skydance has inked a deal with Microsoft-owned Activision Blizzard to adapt video game franchise 'Call of Duty' into a live-action feature film, CNBC reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 养老金谈判失败后汉莎航空可能面临飞行员罢工
item.description: 路透社周二看到的一封德国 VC 飞行员工会的信函显示，在与汉莎航空公司就其养老金计划的谈判破裂后，该工会呼吁其成员就罢工行动进行投票。【原文：Germany's VC pilots' union called for a ballot of its members on strike action after talks with airline Lufthansa on its pension scheme collapsed, a letter from the union seen by Reuters on Tuesday showed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，谷歌广告技术罚款被搁置，欧盟正等待美国降低汽车关税
item.description: 三位知情人士周二表示，欧盟反垄断监管机构已推迟对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌的广告技术业务处以罚款，同时等待美国作为贸易协议的一部分削减对欧洲汽车的关税。【原文：EU antitrust regulators have delayed fining Alphabet's Google over its adtech business, while waiting for the United States to cut tariffs on European cars as part of a trade deal, three people with knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚 2025 年天然气投资预计增长 35%，达到 11 亿美元，Naturgas 协会称
item.description: 哥伦比亚天然气协会主席卢斯-斯特拉-穆尔加斯（Luz Stella Murgas）周二表示，在为减少燃料短缺而进行的勘探和生产工作的推动下，预计 2025 年哥伦比亚天然气行业的投资将增长 34.6%，达到 11 亿美元。【原文：Investment in Colombia's natural gas industry is expected to increase by 34.6% to $1.1 billion in 2025, driven by exploration and production efforts to reduce the fuel deficit, association president Luz Stella Murgas said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高露洁-棕榄公司就养老金问题与员工达成 3.32 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 高露洁-棕榄公司（Colgate-Palmolive）同意支付 3.32 亿美元，以了结一项旷日持久的集体诉讼，该诉讼指控这家消费品公司在计算员工养老金时出现错误。【原文：Colgate-Palmolive agreed to pay $332 million to settle a long-running class-action lawsuit accusing the consumer products company of making mistakes in calculating its employees' pensions.】

item.title: 美国 7 月建筑支出下滑
item.description: 由于高抵押贷款利率继续制约住房市场，美国 7 月份的建筑支出有所下降。【原文：U.S. construction spending fell in July as high mortgage rates continued to constrain the housing market.】

item.title: 微软将为美国政府提供折扣云服务
item.description: 美国总务管理局（General Services Administration）周二表示，微软已同意为美国各机构的云服务提供折扣，这是政府推动各行政部门与科技公司签署协议的一部分。【原文：Microsoft has agreed to give U.S. agencies a discount on its cloud services, the General Services Administration said Tuesday, as part of the administration’s push to sign deals with tech companies for departments across the executive branch.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院裁定特朗普关税非法，华尔街权衡最新变数
item.description: 在联邦上诉法院裁定唐纳德-特朗普总统的大部分全面关税措施非法之后，周二从劳动节假期归来的美国投资者又遭遇了贸易政策的新的不确定性。【原文：U.S. investors returning from Labor Day break on Tuesday were hit with fresh uncertainty in trade policy after a federal appeals court ruled most of President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs illegal.】

item.title: 美国首次公开募股市场重启，特朗普关税忧虑消退
item.description: 随着投资者对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的焦虑开始缓解，周二，从加密货币到消费等各行各业的多家公司启动了首次公开募股（IPO）路演，拉开了劳动节后秋季窗口期的序幕。【原文：A slew of companies across sectors, ranging from crypto to consumer, launched IPO roadshows on Tuesday, kicking off the post-Labor Day fall window as investor anxiety over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs started to ease.】

item.title: 经过漫长的安全审查，日本批准台湾雅歌公司竞标芝浦项目
item.description: 日本已向台湾雅吉欧公司发放了国家安全许可，允许该公司主动竞购芝浦电子公司（Shibaura Electronics）。【原文：Japan has granted national security clearance to Taiwan's Yageo for its unsolicited bid to buy Shibaura Electronics , concluding a lengthy review that underscored Tokyo's tighter security control for sensitive technologies.】

item.title: 美国制造业陷入疲软；人工智能支出大增助力部分工厂
item.description: 由于工厂继续努力应对进口关税的影响，8 月份美国制造业连续第六个月出现萎缩，但人工智能消费热潮为该行业的某些领域提供了支持。【原文：U.S. manufacturing contracted for a sixth straight month in August as factories continued to grapple with the impact of import tariffs, but an artificial intelligence spending boom is lending support to some segments of the industry.】

item.title: 多少黄金才足以实现中国储备的多元化？
item.description: 自 2023 年以来，中国央行积极购买黄金，这引发了一个问题：中国政府将在多大程度上增加其储备，因为它正试图减少对美元的依赖，并使其持有的黄金与其世界第二大经济体的地位保持一致。【原文：Aggressive gold-buying by China's central bank since 2023 has raised the question of how far Beijing will boost its reserves as it tries to reduce its reliance on the dollar and align its holdings with its status as the world's second largest economy.】

item.title: 随着管制收紧，美国撤销台积电的快速对华出口资格
item.description: 芯片制造商台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司周二表示，美国已撤销该公司向其中国主要工厂运送关键设备的授权。【原文：The U.S. has revoked Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co's authorization to ship key equipment to its main China facility, the chip manufacturer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德意志银行从汇丰银行聘请丽莎-麦基奥夫（Lisa McGeough）担任美洲区主管
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周二宣布，聘请丽莎-麦格夫（Lisa McGeough）担任美洲地区主管兼美国业务首席执行官，此前她在汇丰银行（HSBC）担任类似职务数月后离职。【原文：Deutsche Bank hired Lisa McGeough as its head of the Americas region and CEO of its U.S. business, the company announced on Tuesday, after she left a similar role at HSBC months into the job.】

item.title: 区块链贷款公司加入市场热潮，Figure 在美国 IPO 寻求 5.26 亿美元估值
item.description: 区块链贷款公司Figure Technologies及其卖方股东周二表示，由于市场乐观情绪推动了新股上市潮，该公司计划在美国首次公开募股中筹集高达5.2632亿美元的资金。【原文：Blockchain lender Figure Technologies and its selling shareholders aim to raise up to $526.32 million in a U.S. initial public offering, the company said Tuesday, as market optimism drives a wave of new listings.】

item.title: Telus 将以 5.39 亿美元收购数字部门剩余股份
item.description: 加拿大电信公司 Telus 周二表示，将以 5.39 亿美元的现金加股票交易收购其数字服务部门的剩余股份，以拓展其人工智能能力。【原文：Telus said on Tuesday it would buy the remaining shares in its digital services unit in a $539 million cash-and-stock deal, as the Canadian telecom company looks to expand its artificial intelligence capabilities.】

item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局（FDA）推动减少动物试验，人工智能驱动的药物发现加速发展
item.description: 药物开发商正越来越多地采用人工智能技术进行发现和安全性测试，以获得更快、更便宜的结果，这与美国食品及药物管理局推动在不久的将来减少动物试验是一致的。【原文：Drug developers are increasing adoption of AI technologies for discovery and safety testing to get faster and cheaper results, in line with an FDA push to reduce animal testing in the near future.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金购买纽约办公楼 95% 的股份
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金周二表示，它已购买了纽约市美洲大道沿线一处办公楼物业95%的股份。【原文：Norway's sovereign wealth fund said on Tuesday it has bought a 95% stake in an office property located along New York City's Avenue of the Americas.】

item.title: 巴西第二季度经济大幅放缓但仍超预期
item.description: 周二的官方数据显示，巴西经济在第二季度失去了增长势头，但在服务业活动复苏和采掘业增长的推动下，其表现仍优于市场预期。【原文：Brazil's economy lost momentum in the second quarter but still outperformed market expectations, driven by resilient services activity and gains in the extractive industry, official data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 世贸组织负责人：关税对全球贸易规则造成 "前所未有 "的破坏
item.description: 世界贸易组织总干事周二告诉路透社记者，在国际贸易体系遭遇过去80年来最严重破坏的情况下，按世贸组织条件完成的全球贸易份额已降至72%，而且还可能进一步下降。【原文：The share of global trade done on WTO terms has fallen to 72% and could fall further, amid the biggest disruption to the international trading system in the past 80 years, the Director-General of the World Trade Organization told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雀巢新任首席执行官面临诸多问题
item.description: Laurent Freixe 的突然解职让 Philipp Navratil 一夜之间成为了最高职位。【原文：The abrupt dismissal of Laurent Freixe has catapulted Philipp Navratil into the top job overnight.】

item.title: 印度市场监管部门批准美容和家庭护理应用 Urban Company 首次公开募股
item.description: 周二的一份监管公告显示，印度市场监管部门已批准 Urban Company 首次公开发行股票。【原文：India's markets regulator has approved an initial public offering by Urban Company, a regulatory notice showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 零售商和农民团体要求印度避开亚马逊放宽投资规则的请求
item.description: 一封信显示，支持数百万印度小型零售商的团体敦促政府回避亚马逊提出的放宽严格的出口外商投资规定的要求，因为反对这一有争议的政策变化的呼声日益高涨。【原文：Groups backing millions of small Indian retailers have urged the government to shun Amazon's request to ease strict foreign investment rules for exports, a letter shows, as opposition to a contentious policy change grows.】

item.title: 我们对卡夫亨氏分拆后业务的了解
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周二表示，将把旗下的食品杂货和调味酱业务分拆成两家上市公司，以应对消费者消费疲软。【原文：Kraft Heinz said on Tuesday it will split its grocery and sauces businesses into two publicly traded companies, responding to sluggish consumer spending.】

item.title: 恩桥公司将继续实施阿尔冈昆天然气输送管道扩建项目
item.description: Enbridge 周二表示，该公司已作出最终投资决定，将继续进行阿尔冈昆天然气输送（AGT）管道扩建，以充分利用美国日益增长的天然气需求。【原文：Enbridge said on Tuesday it has reached a final investment decision to go ahead with Algonquin gas transmission (AGT) pipeline expansion to capitalize on the growing natural gas demand in the United States.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，埃利奥特以 40 亿美元入股百事公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）已持有百事公司 40 亿美元的股份，并正计划发起一场激进运动，以提振该公司的股价。【原文：Elliott Management has taken a $4 billion stake in PepsiCo and is planning an activist campaign to boost the company's share price, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 连锁咖啡馆黑岩咖啡吧在美国首次公开募股中的目标估值为 8.61 亿美元
item.description: 黑石咖啡吧连锁店周二表示，其纽约首次公开募股的目标估值高达 8.607 亿美元。【原文：Black Rock Coffee Bar is targeting a valuation of up to $860.7 million in its New York initial public offering, the cafe chain said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国 JLR 公司的生产和销售在网络事件后中断
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商捷豹-路虎（Jaguar Land Rover）周二表示，由于发生网络事件，其零售和生产活动受到严重干扰。【原文：British luxury carmaker Jaguar Land Rover on Tuesday said that its retail and production activities have been severely disrupted following a cyber incident.】

item.title: 备忘录称，大众劳资老板敦促布卢姆放弃双重首席执行官职位
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，大众汽车公司的劳工老板周二向首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆施加了更大的压力，要求他放弃作为这家总部位于沃尔夫斯堡的汽车制造商及其保时捷公司领导人的双重身份。【原文：Volkswagen's labour boss on Tuesday increased pressure on CEO Oliver Blume to give up his dual role as the leader of both the Wolfsburg-based carmaker and its Porsche AG unit, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】
